price: 142. Markuu walaalkood Saalix ku yidhi: “Miyeydaan iska jireyn (shirkiga iyo xumaha kale)?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ صَٰلِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum ṣāliḥun alā tattaqūna
